title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Comments on 80th Anniversary of Holocaust Being Debated in Commons
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, on Twitter on 15 December 2022. The speech referenced was made on 17 December 1942 by Anthony Eden.
content:
80 years ago, Parliament listened in stunned silence as the truth of the Holocaust was spoken in the House of Commons for the very first time.
